Forgotten Realms Cormyr
http://frc.proboards.com

CEP HAK IS REQUIRED TO PLAY HERE

LVL cap 40 (very few make it there)
This is a VERY RP focused server. LVL'ing will be slow, rp will be consistent, the higher end of magic items are priced ridiculously and in general capped at +3 on arms and armor. Gods and domains are (in theory) required to be accurate for clerics.

Back up and actually VERY active again. consistently seeing 20+ on it average and during pop times i've seen it hit 40's and I've not been able to check pop cap regularly! so looks like its back strong!

Special rules I can recall(see links below for full list):
only 1 prestige class allowed
prestige class can only start AFTER lvl 9(meaning the first level you can take is at 10)
no Dev Crit
Cleric's (and most others when it comes to gods) follow a one step rule for Dieties(all right at the start are required to pick a god or be faithless)
no monk/druid
Shadowdancer, shifter, Blackguard and Purple Dragon Knight are by application only I believe (as is rp'ing a red wizard of Thay)
Harper class is guild only and AA is CAPPED at 10 levels
There is a farming rule: short version is you can visit a dungeon only a certain number of times per REAL LIFE DAYS per character. (multi characters? each can visit once per time frame)
- Character levels 1 through 5 - 1 visit per day
- Character levels 6 through 40 - 1 visit every 7 days
